content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.revenueverticalreport') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.revenueverticalreport
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.revenueverticalreport (

[billingcustomerid] int,
[billingcustomername] nvarchar(4000),
[date] date,
[zonerouteid] int,
[zonedescription] nvarchar(4000),
[noofparcels] bigint,
[kgsconsigned] numeric(36,6),
[revenue] numeric(36,6),
[fuelsurcharge] numeric(36,6),
[docsurcharge] numeric(36,6),
[othersurcharge] numeric(36,6),
[covidsurcharge] numeric(36,6),
[exception] numeric(36,6),
[total] numeric(36,6),
	
	)

	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/RPT/revenueverticalreport.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.revenueverticalreport 
GO
